data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample SHCHUCHP-112

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Torf, Tree line -70 m, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 75%, Herb cover 10%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Lockerer Lä/Fi-,Moos-,Strauch-Wald, Film number: 877A
